name: add_comment_to_media
description: Add a comment to a media post.

media_id.description: The ID of the media post being commented on.

user_id.description: The ID of the user making the comment.

name: create_media_post
description: Creates a new media post associated with a user.

user_id.description: The ID of the media owner; must be a non-empty string.

image_url.description: URL of the media image, which must be a non-empty string.

caption.description: A string serving as the caption or description for the media, defaulting to `""`.

name: create_user
description: Creates a new user with a given ID, name, and username.

user_id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

username.description: A string representing the user's username.

media_id.description: A non-empty string representing the unique identifier of the media post to delete.

name: delete_user
description: Deletes a specified user from the system.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user to delete.

name: get_user_details
description: Retrieve information about a specific user.

user_id.description: The unique identifier for the user to retrieve; cannot be empty.

name: get_user_id_by_username
description: Search for a user by their username and return the corresponding user ID.

username.description: The username for lookup, which cannot be empty or contain only whitespace.

name: list_all_users
description: Lists all users in the system.

name: list_media_comments
description: Lists all comments on a specific media post.

media_id.description: The string ID of the media post used to retrieve comments.
